accommodation.name: Pod Hotels Times Square
accommodation.description: Modern compact hotel in the heart of Times Square with stylish design
accommodation.tips: Request a higher floor for better city views; great location for Broadway shows

accommodation.name: citizenM New York Bowery
accommodation.description: Design hotel in trendy Lower East Side with modern amenities
accommodation.tips: Check out the rooftop bar for great city skyline views

activities.name: AirTrain + Subway to Manhattan
activities.description: Take AirTrain from JFK to Jamaica, then subway to Manhattan
activities.tips: Buy a MetroCard for convenient subway travel throughout your stay

activities.name: Central Park Walking Tour
activities.description: Self-guided walk through America's most famous urban park
activities.tips: Visit Bethesda Fountain, Bow Bridge, and Strawberry Fields; beautiful fall foliage in November

activities.name: Shake Shack
activities.description: Famous NYC burger chain with premium fast-casual dining
activities.tips: Try the ShackBurger and concrete custard dessert; multiple locations throughout the city

activities.name: Times Square Evening
activities.description: Experience the bright lights and energy of Times Square at night
activities.tips: Best experienced after dark when all the billboards light up; great for photos

activities.name: Broadway Show
activities.description: Catch a world-class Broadway musical or play
activities.tips: Book popular shows in advance; try lottery tickets for discounted last-minute seats

activities.name: Statue of Liberty & Ellis Island
activities.description: Ferry to Liberty Island and Ellis Island for iconic American landmarks
activities.tips: Book pedestal or crown access in advance; bring layers as it can be windy on the water

activities.name: Stone Street Historic District
activities.description: Historic cobblestone street in Financial District with restaurants and bars
activities.tips: Great for lunch and photos; one of NYC's few remaining cobblestone streets

activities.name: 9/11 Memorial
activities.description: Moving tribute to those lost in the September 11th attacks
activities.tips: Very emotional experience; museum tickets required for indoor exhibits

activities.name: Brooklyn Bridge Walk
activities.description: Walk across the iconic Brooklyn Bridge for stunning city views
activities.tips: Start from Manhattan side; sunset timing offers beautiful photography opportunities

activities.name: Grimaldi's Pizza
activities.description: Famous coal-fired brick oven pizza in Brooklyn Heights
activities.tips: No reservations accepted; try the classic margherita pizza

activities.name: Metropolitan Museum of Art
activities.description: One of the world's largest and most prestigious art museums
activities.tips: Focus on specific wings to avoid overwhelm; Egyptian art and European paintings are highlights

activities.name: Lunch at The Plaza Food Hall
activities.description: Upscale food court in the basement of The Plaza Hotel
activities.tips: Multiple food vendors offering various cuisines; beautiful elegant setting

activities.name: High Line Park
activities.description: Elevated park built on former railway line with unique city views
activities.tips: Enter at Gansevoort Street; walk north to 34th Street for full experience

activities.name: Chelsea Market
activities.description: Indoor food hall and shopping complex in converted cookie factory
activities.tips: Try lobster roll from Lobster Place and artisanal chocolates from L'Arte del Gelato

activities.name: Empire State Building
activities.description: Iconic Art Deco skyscraper with observation decks
activities.tips: Night visits offer spectacular city lights; book express tickets to skip lines

activities.name: Museum of Modern Art (MoMA)
activities.description: World's most influential modern and contemporary art museum
activities.tips: Don't miss Van Gogh's Starry Night and Picasso's Les Demoiselles d'Avignon

activities.name: Fifth Avenue Shopping
activities.description: Shop at iconic stores along Fifth Avenue including Tiffany & Co and Saks
activities.tips: Window shopping is free and equally enjoyable; visit Apple Store's glass cube

activities.name: Katz's Delicatessen
activities.description: Legendary Jewish deli famous for pastrami sandwiches since 1888

location.address: 205 E Houston St, New York, NY 10002

activities.tips: Order the pastrami on rye; don't lose your ticket or pay $50 fee!

activities.name: AirTrain to JFK
activities.description: Return journey to airport via subway and AirTrain
activities.tips: Allow extra time for TSA security; JFK can be busy

tips: Purchase a MetroCard or use contactless payment for subway travel
Tipping is expected - 18-20% at restaurants, $1-2 per drink at bars
Book Broadway shows and popular restaurants in advance
Walk when possible - many attractions are within walking distance
November can be chilly, so bring layers and comfortable walking shoes
Many museums have 'suggested' admission fees - you can pay what you wish
